item.title: The Last Holocron
item.description: A Star Wars fan novelette by Taryn Vox — free to download in PDF, ePub, and Kindle formats.

item.title: Now Available: The Last Holocron
item.description: No email walls. No credits required. Just a free, atmospheric Star Wars story set in the shadows between empires.

item.title: Top 25 Star Wars Legends Books
item.description: Our definitive guide to the most essential Star Wars Legends books — from Thrawn to Bane and beyond.

item.title: Complete Star Wars Legends Timeline
item.description: An exhaustive reading order of Star Wars Legends (Expanded Universe) novels — all 427 entries, chronologically arranged with shop links.

item.title: Jedi Archive Resource Wing
item.description: Explore our personally curated Jedi Archive resources — tools, tomes, and Star Wars treasures to fuel your obsession.
